docs.name: MaterialToggleComponent
docs.comment:
material-toggle is a button that can be either ON or OFF.

User can tap the toggle button to change the state. Usually you use toggle buttons when you have a single ON/OFF option. If you have multiple options from a set to be checked/unchecked, use material-checkbox instead.

inputs.name: ariaLabel
inputs.comment: ARIA label to use for the toggle button.

inputs.name: checked
inputs.comment:
Current state of the toggle button.

true is ON and false is OFF.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.comment:
Enables/disables the toggle button.

true is disabled and false is enabled.

outputs.name: onChecked
outputs.comment: Event that is fired when the toggle is checked.
